EmailTemplate.name: 2014 MUFC
EmailTemplate.subject: Prizes? "We don't need no stinking prizes"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Nope, we're not going to try to lure to our booth with, iPads, trips to exotic lands or any other "exciting" prizes.
But... if you would like to learn how franchisees just like you, are saving $1,000's and more every month, at ZERO cost, we encourage you to stop by the WEX rapid! PayCard Booth#526 for more info.
We promise, no selling and just the facts. From there, you can decide whether or not our FREE program fills a need for your business, as it has for so many other franchisees nationwide.
We hope you'll stop by for a chat,
The WEX, rapid! PayCard Team
